title: Account Transfered without approval
body:
I went to log in to my main today after not playing for a few days and it has been transferred to another region?

To make matters worse I cannot seem to recover it via my email address either because 1) they have changed the relevant email address or 2) It was not my original account and I created it a long time ago and account remember the email address, but I did open my 4 emails that I know of and no details about the account.

Very frustrating, I have opened a ticket hopefully it doesn't take too long to be answered but im worried about my account

Has anyone else had this issue before? or have any suggestions how I can get my account back? 

PS this is a smurf account my main is 'thegamefiends' without the second s

Cheers

replies.body: How did you find out that the account was transferred?
